definitions.name: Fireball
definitions.description: Deal damage to target

definitions.name: Trenchcoat Mushrooms
definitions.description: Mysterious fungal creatures

definitions.name: Monk
definitions.description: Holy warrior with divine powers

definitions.name: Market Hustler
definitions.description: Trade and commerce hub

definitions.name: Steal
definitions.description: When Revealed: Lower the power of each card in your opponent's hand by 1

definitions.name: King
definitions.description: When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each enemy card here

definitions.name: Stink Trap
definitions.description: When ANY other card is played here, lower that card's power by 1

definitions.name: Lightning Wizard
definitions.description: When Revealed: Discard your other cards here, gain +2 power for each discarded

definitions.name: Hypnosis
definitions.description: When Revealed: Move away an enemy card here with the lowest power

definitions.name: Beehive
definitions.description: When Revealed: Gain +5 power if there is exactly one enemy card here

definitions.name: Pollination
definitions.description: When Revealed: Give cards in your hand +1 power

definitions.name: Mimic
definitions.description: Add a copy to your hand after this card is played

definitions.name: Sea Monster
definitions.description: Fearsome aquatic beast

definitions.name: Coin
definitions.description: When Revealed: Gain +2 mana next turn

definitions.name: Cult
definitions.description: When Revealed: Both players draw a card

definitions.name: Bell Towers
definitions.description: When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each card in your discard pile

definitions.name: Rebirth
definitions.description: When Revealed: Gain +2 power for each of your other cards here

definitions.name: Water Dragon
definitions.description: When Revealed: Moves to another location, gaining +1 power each time it moves

definitions.name: Ocean Treasure
definitions.description: When Revealed: Add a copy with +1 power to your hand

definitions.name: Fire Element
definitions.description: End of Turn: Loses 1 power if not winning this location

definitions.name: Lightning Element
definitions.description: When Revealed: Set ALL cards here to 3 power

definitions.name: Air Element
definitions.description: When Revealed: Lower the power of each enemy card here by 1

definitions.name: Water Element
definitions.description: Gain +1 power when you play another card here

definitions.name: Dark Element
definitions.description: When Revealed: Lower the cost of 2 cards in your hand by 1

definitions.name: Earth Element
definitions.description: When Revealed: Discard the lowest power card in your hand

definitions.name: Blood Ring
definitions.description: When Revealed: Draw a card from your opponent's deck

definitions.name: Book
definitions.description: When Revealed: If no ally cards are here, lower this card's power by 5

definitions.name: Roll Dice
definitions.description: End of Turn: Set this card's power to a random value between 1 and 7

definitions.name: Block
definitions.description: End of Turn: Give +2 power to each location (all cards at each location gain +2 power)

definitions.name: Wizard
definitions.description: When Revealed: Discards your other cards here, add their power to this card
